All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArrayConverter
Class to convert sql arrays to java arrays or collections and vice versa.
ConfigurationStage
Configuration stage, which is used to configura a HikariConfig.
ConfigurationStage<T>
Configuration stage of a QueryBuilder
Database<T extends JdbcConfig<?>>
Defines a sql type and handles RDBMS specific actions.
DatabaseConfig
Class which provides basic data for a database
DataHolder
Base class which can be used for classes which call the database.
DataSourceCreator<T extends JdbcConfig<?>>
Class to create a HikariDataSource with a builder pattern.
DataSourceProvider
A class which can provide a datasource
DefaultDatabase<T extends JdbcConfig<?>>
Represents a default database
ExceptionTransformer
Utilitites for database handling
InsertStage
Stage representing the result of a insert statement.
JdbcConfig<T extends JdbcConfig<?>>
A basic jdbc config
JdbcStage<T>
A stage which represents a property creator for a data source.
JdbProperty<T>
A key value pair used to represent url parameter
MariaDb
Represents a MariaDb database.
MariaDbJdbc
Represents a builder to create a MariaDB jdbc url.
MariaDbJdbc.SslMode
Represetns different SSL modes
MariaDbTypes
Represents the data types of a MariaDB database
MySql
Represents a SqLite database.
MySQLJdbc
A builder to create a MySQL jdbc url.
MySqlTypes
Represents types of a MySQL database.
NotImplementedException
Thrown when a method is called which is not implemented but supported by this type.
NotSupportedException
Thrown when a method is called which is not supported by this type.
ParamBuilder
A class which wrapps a PreparedStatement and allows to set the values with a builder pattern.
PostgreSql
Represents a PostgreSQL database.
PostgreSqlJdbc
Builder to create a jdbc url for postgresql.
PostgreSqlJdbc.SslMode
Represents different ssl modes.
PostgreSqlTypes
Types present in a postgresql database.
QueryBuilder<T>
This query builder can be used to execute one or more queries onto a database via a connection provided by a datasource.
QueryBuilderConfig
Configuration for a QueryBuilder
QueryBuilderConfig.Builder
Builder for a QueryBuilderConfig
QueryExecutionException
Exception to wrap Exception as Exception thrown during queries executed by QueryBuilder
QueryFactory
Base class which provides a factory for easy usage.
QueryReplacement
Represents a replacement inside a sql query.
QueryStage<T>
Query stage of a QueryBuilder
RemoteJdbcConfig<T extends RemoteJdbcConfig<?>>
Represents a jdbc config for a remote database.
ResultStage<T>
Represents a ResultStage of a QueryBuilder.
RetrievalStage<T>
Represents a RetrievalStage of a QueryBuilder.
Row
Represents the row of an result set.
SqLite
Represents a SqLite database.
SqLiteJdbc
A builder to create a jdbc url for SqLite
SqLiteTypes
Types supported by SqLite.
SqlType
Represents a named data type in a database.
SqlUpdater<T extends JdbcConfig<?>>
An SQL updater which performs database updates via upgrade scripts.
SqlUpdater.SqlUpdaterBuilder<T extends JdbcConfig<?>>
Class to build a SqlUpdater with a builder pattern
SqlVersion
Class representing a version maintained by the SqlUpdater.
StatementStage<T>
Statement stage of a QueryBuilder
ThrowingConsumer<T,Exception extends Exception>
Represents an operation that accepts a single input argument and returns no result.
ThrowingFunction<R,T,E extends Exception>
Represents a function which can throw an exception.
UpdateException
Represents a exception thrown while the database got updated.
UpdateResult
Represent the result of an UpdateStage or InsertStage
UpdateStage
Represents a UpdateStage of a QueryBuilder.
UUIDConverter
Convert uuids to bytes and vice versa
WrappedQueryExecutionException
Exception to wrap Exception as RuntimeException thrown during queries executed by QueryBuilder
